summary: This is an email from August 6, 2021, regarding a fact witness travel request to the Southern District of New York (SDNY) for trial preparation. The sender requests that the witness (referred to as 'M') stay at a different hotel than another individual who will be in the area the same week, to avoid an encounter.

events.title: Trial Preparation Meeting with M
events.description: A trial preparation meeting is scheduled with the fact witness 'M' at an unspecified time (fpm) in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Trial Preparation Meeting with M
events.description: A trial preparation meeting is scheduled with the fact witness 'M' at 10am in the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: A fact witness, referred to as 'M', was scheduled for trial preparation meetings in SDNY on August 16th and 17th, 2021.
The sender of the email requested that 'M' stay at a different hotel than another individual who would be in the area the same week, to prevent them from running into each other.
The document is an email dated August 6, 2021, concerning travel arrangements for a witness in an ongoing legal proceeding, indicating active case preparation at that time.
